npcs.name: Aemilia Sevso
utterances: Let me guess, your looking for poison right?
Poison testers, it's been my biggest seller for the past several months.  Of course poison was a close second.
I need to get some eye of griffon, a bear's paw, the heart of an innocent man.  That'll be tough in this city!

npcs.name: Alypia Damian
utterances: Well, hello there. Aren't you the most precious thing! Want to see what I'm selling? I've many nice things that'd do wonders for your image, and my prices are very fair.

npcs.name: Annia Velithe
utterances: Be swift with your business here.  I'm not here to entertain and amuse you.

npcs.name: Armormaster Ikthar Icehammer
utterances: You can always go with the chain over the vanguard.  It's cheaper, but tell me, will you buy yourself a new life?
What can I do to convince you to walk out of here with that plate mail suit you've been checking out?
Would you like to see all of the colors that the suits come in?  I think we have a lavender leather suit in the back.

npcs.name: Atianoo Donicus
utterances: I am deep in thought.  Please deprive me of your company.
Hello.  By the way, I dont care.  Thanks.
The mindless babbling of a simpleton delights me to no end.
When I rule the world, I will enjoy deciding who lives and dies.
I have no patience for someone with such a limited mind.

npcs.name: Bruccius Capito
utterances: Helloo there!  Can you feel it?  The wind is changing direction....

npcs.name: Carius Aruns
utterances: The only thing separating you from death in this city are your wits.  I wouldn't call that adequate protection.
A good weapon at your side is the only real friend you'll ever have!
We have a nice selection of previously owned weapons for those with modest funds.

npcs.name: Chonax Bonedancer
utterances: Me likes it when they are scared.  It tastes better that way.
You can't eat money. Then why people care about it so much?
I like killing things just to see them die.  Dont you?
Ripping and tearing, ripping and tearing, ripping and tearing, ripping...
Friends are good until you don't need them anymore.

npcs.name: City Registrar Glamis
utterances: Greetings, loyal citizen. I'm the Registrar for the City of Freeport.  When you wish to form a guild within the city, you must bring six members here and pay a nominal fee to the Overlord.

npcs.name: Culdor
utterances: You need help fixing that pile of junk?  Well it's going to cost you.
Nah, no need to buy a completely new set.  I'll use some of this special solvent I have.  It'll fix it up good as new!

npcs.name: Dalal Akilia
utterances: Hello, good friend.  How can I be of service to ye?  Interested in buying an item?  My contacts allow me to get unbelievably low prices on almost any consignment item from anywhere in the world.

npcs.name: Damar G`Thez
utterances: How dare you speak to me as if I was nothing more than a dirty troll!

npcs.name: Decius Dekarn
utterances: I'm here to buy any of that old armor you may have from Dyric.  Don't worry, I'll give you a reasonable price for it.  I also have some new armor for sale if you are interested.

npcs.name: Dyric Pire
utterances: I don't have time for you. I'm trying to work. If you need armor, find someone more suited to your ... taste.

npcs.name: Fadia Coggles
utterances: Only an amateur would bother worrying about ethics!
It's interesting how ratonga always find their way around the maze-like corridors of Temple Street.
If I put crossbows on the heads of sharks, I'm certain they would one day replace guard dogs altogether!

npcs.name: First-Mate Gimblefuzzle
utterances: I may be a hired hand of the Far Sea Trading Company, but I take pride in my work.
Get out of my face, scum!  You don't need to talk to me, buy your stuff and move on.
You just buy the merchandise and move along.  I got my eye on you!
After twelve weeks at sea, bashing the head of a nosey landlubber sounds quite appealing!

npcs.name: Fisherman Zogz
utterances: Treat us badly in Neriak! I laugh now we in same spot!
Tasty treats, lots of meats.
Nasty scars and boiled tar!  Warriors is what we are!

npcs.name: Foreman Asprenus
utterances: Before you go opening your mouth, remember that I'm a citizen of Freeport.  A rich one at that.

npcs.name: Harbinger McDannis
utterances: Sure there are smarter races, but none as strong as mine!
I'm sure you're smart enough to know how fast I can kill you.
Listen dead man, If you really want to keep talking to me I can make your life a lot shorter.
Yeah, thats blood on my tunic, don't make me add yours to my collection.
Watch your tone with me, scum.
I've slain better men than you for less than this.
It might be good to notice that my fist is bigger than your head.
Don't worry, you can walk wherever you want your highness.

npcs.name: Harbormaster Duskmark
utterances: In spite of the cost of living, it's still quite a popular item.

npcs.name: Irena
utterances: I find things that haven't even been lost yet.
It's not true that the kerra always land on their feet.
Never ask when you can just take.
That rat snitch better watch her back tonight.

npcs.name: Javvy
utterances: Shove off! Not interested in company. Leave me to my grog.

npcs.name: Jistarr
utterances: I have more talent in my tail than you have in your entire body.
Were all the barbarians to be slaughtered, I would call it a mercy killing.
Silence.  I do not wish to hear your chatter.

npcs.name: Josef
utterances: Are you threatening me?
Hey!  A deal is a deal.  Until a better one comes along.
I dabble in repossessions and personal loans.
I was never even near the bank.
There's no way they're better than us.  We have more.

npcs.name: Julie Danerous
utterances: I'll offer you one warning:Watch your step and your purse in Freeport. This city is full of questionable characters who would love to relieve you of your coin and your life. Now be on your way.

npcs.name: Kirsteh the Witch
utterances: I'll ask you to leave before I lose my patience and turn your limbs into blackened withered stumps.

npcs.name: Kouryick
utterances: What do you want?  Can't you see I want to be alone?  Wait.  Wait.  Maybe you can help me?

A Seafury ship with some very personal cargo went down off the coast of the Nektulos forest.  I know those Nerius marauders were responsible! I just know it! If you get my cargo back for me, I'd be very grateful.  I'd do it, but I'm so busy.

npcs.name: Kronasoo
utterances: If at first you don't succeed, then you should finally accept the truth that you are a failure.
The mind is a terrible thing to waste.  Feeling guilty, are we?
I can never understand why stupid people don't choke on their tongues.
There are no stupid questions, only stupid people.  What was your question again?
The disadvantage of being better than everyone else is that people assume you're pretentious.

npcs.name: Loche V'Lys
utterances: Yes, what is it?  Oh, another one of those adventurers.  If you've got any of that old armor from Kirsteh, give it here and I'll sell you some new armor.

npcs.name: Lollia Parnesius
utterances: Oh, hello there! Perhaps my eyes fail me, but you look like you're handy with a quill. Can you do some scribe work for me?

npcs.name: Marcia Betto
utterances: The stuff's over there.  Just let me know if you find anything you like.
Hello there, kind adventurer.  My merchandise carries the seal of the Overlord himself!  Go ahead, take a look!

npcs.name: Mariner D`Vez
utterances: This ain't a show stranger, buy your goods and shove-off!
You just buy the merchandise and move along.  I've got my eye on you!

npcs.name: Mariner Ninetails
utterances: If you want a friend, buy a pet.  I'm not here to chit-chat with you adventurer.
Once I am off duty, I will be heading straight to the tavern.
I may be a hired hand of the Far Sea Trading Company, but I take pride in my work.
What do you think you're looking at?

npcs.name: Master Archer Hawkeye Hallard
utterances: In spite of the cost of living, it's still quite a popular item.
Hello there, kind adventurer.  My merchandise carries the seal of the Overlord himself!  Go ahead, take a look!
Are you going to buy anything today or am I just wasting my time?  This isn't a museum display you know!

npcs.name: Mehina
utterances: I don't care what they say.  This town is not much to look at, is it?
There's no place for the elderly in this town.

npcs.name: Melenia Scantus
utterances: Fingers make a tasty treat.  Yours are looking pretty ripe.
Did you just speak to me?  You're braver than most.
Don't worry. The last time I killed someone was a few months ago. I've almost forgot how its done.

npcs.name: Moirae Nalascos
utterances: What made you think I wanted to talk to you?

npcs.name: Neskavul
utterances: I have found fear is always a good motivator.
Now that Cazic is gone, we are all that's left to fear.

npcs.name: Odyssneu
utterances: Yes, I know you seek what I have access to. Then again, who doesn't?  So what can I help you acquire?
Welcome, friend! The wares of an entire city are at your fingertips. So please make your selection.

npcs.name: Progenitus
utterances: Hello! Can I offer you one of our new lifetime extended warranties for any merchandise you purchase?

npcs.name: Putad Bloodrinker
utterances: People have so many pretty, pretty colors inside them.  You want me show you? Hmmm?
Overlord is the strongest troll ever!  He kill twenty of us troll last week.  Wow!
It would have been fun to be on Luclin when it blew up.  Wheee!
So many things to kill me, dont know where to start.
I used to have my own bridge before tasty dark elves took it from me.

npcs.name: Ranik Calman
utterances: Aye. Welcome to the Seafarer's Roost. Been out at sea for a while, or just stopping through? Put some coin in my hand and I'll sell ye drinks until ye sail out again.

npcs.name: Rashja
utterances: In the heat of battle is the only way to die.
Armor is just an extension of my skin.

npcs.name: Renny Parvat
utterances: What are you looking at?   Stay away from me, and keep your hands off my collections, you scumbag!

What collections?  What do you mean, "What collections?" My collections, you fool! If you think you're going to get them from me, you're wrong!   But if you have something to donate, then maybe we can talk.

npcs.name: Rumdum
utterances: What in Zek do you want?  Can't ya see I'm drinkin' here...

npcs.name: Salonia Siculus
utterances: Please don't touch anything.  This isn't a museum. If you break it, you buy it!

npcs.name: Seafury Felvonitor
utterances: I don't trust the Freeport Militia. Neither should you, mate.
Arcane Scientists couldn't navigate their way through shallow waters without a map if they tried.
The Dismal Rage is hideous I tell you. I always get the shivers when I pass by them.
Dealing with the Coalition of Tradefolke will only burn your plunder and empty your pockets.

npcs.name: Seafury Skysearch
utterances: I'd rather be stranded overboard than be converted by the dark beliefs that Dismal Rage preaches.
You might as well hand your loot to the Coalition of Tradefolke if you ever decide to work for them.
The Seafury Buccaneers are feared by all others on the open sea. They show no mercy to the dogs that try to sail the sea unprotected.

npcs.name: Sergeant Typhoeus
utterances: It's hard to impress the Overlord. Trust me, I know.

npcs.name: Sileni T`Rhizius
utterances: Who do those Iksar think they are?  There will be a reckoning one day, I swear.
Poisoning is always an effective way of winning a debate.
One day, we will rebuild Neriak.  Mark my words, friend; it will happen.
Did you select that outfit or did your parents dress you this morning?
Everyone knows the Teir'Dal are the true power within Freeport.
How dare you speak to me as if I was nothing more than a dirty troll!

npcs.name: Sirraw Swiftpaw
utterances: I'm Sirraw Swiftpaw of the Seafuries. I know everything important that happens in this city. I know nothing of you, therefore you're not important. Leave!

npcs.name: Skaznik
utterances: Hello there, kind adventurer.  My merchandise carries the seal of the Overlord himself!  Go ahead, take a look!
In spite of the cost of living, it's still quite a popular item.
Hello! Can I offer you one of our new lifetime extended warranties for any merchandise you purchase?

npcs.name: Slaughtergrott the Vigilant
utterances: Exciting journeys at sea!  See the new world!
You want to explore?  Rediscover lost lands?
You're of no use to me. You're incapable of finding what I need.

npcs.name: Syrinis H`Gez
utterances: Welcome to the city.  Hopefully you'll live long enough to enjoy your stay.
I'm a dual-breed, not a half-elf.  If you call me half-elf again, I'll cut YOU in half!
Shove off, mate!
I'm in the mood to kick someone in the teeth.

npcs.name: Tarragar Caroom
utterances: Are you going to buy anything today or am I just wasting my time?  This isn't a museum display you know!
In spite of the cost of living, it's still quite a popular item.

npcs.name: Thanatos Kividius
utterances: If you're looking for trouble, I've got a whole fistful of it waiting for you.
Knowing the right people will keep you safe in this city.  You aren't one of them.
Is it even possible for this city to get more corrupt?
Do I look like someone who cares?
You're lucky there are witnesses watching us right now.

npcs.name: Toban Cogscamper
utterances: For the last time, gnomes didn't make Luclin explode!  We would have gone with disintegration.
Through the advances in modern magic, anything is possible.
How many times must I say it?  Acid first, then the eyeballs, not the other way around!
So far, I have found kerrans to have only one life, not nine.  I insist on finding the other eight!
It is said there is more than one way to skin a cat.  My research proves that saying correct.
No, no, no!!!  That will never work!  The person still needs to breathe, don't they?  Don't they?

npcs.name: Urania Helvonius
utterances: One day I'll be famous and everyone here will be sorry they ignored me.
Whoa!!!  I don't remember saying I wanted to talk to you!

npcs.name: Uthngar
utterances: Please stop embarrassing yourself and purchase a real suit of armor.  Are those rags the best you have?
Would you like to see all of the colors that the suits come in?  I think we have a lavender leather suit in the back.
You can always go with the chain over the vanguard.  It's cheaper, but tell me, will you buy yourself a new life?

npcs.name: Vhishall
utterances: Welcome friend of the Overlord,  please look around.  We have several pieces from the Citadel itself!

npcs.name: Viducius Festus
utterances: Hello there, kind adventurer.  My merchandise carries the seal of the Overlord himself!  Go ahead, take a look!
In spite of the cost of living, it's still quite a popular item.

npcs.name: Yohance
utterances: The ratonga are intended to teach us that not everything in nature has a purpose.
The trouble with ratonga is they've got no tact.
You don't want to play my type of games.
For Thule's sake!  What is it?
There is no safety in numbers or in anything else.

npcs.name: Zizwold
utterances: Finally! You've arrived!  Take this and go quickly!  Remember, gather the items exactly as I've specified on the list!  Do not compromise with the quality!  Now, I don't want to hear anything about payment until you've returned!
